#summary Class API for Calendar from module Components
#labels Phase-Support,Deprecated


= Config Table =
|| *Name* || *Default Value* || *Description* ||
|| date || new Date() ||                                 The default date to select ||
|| dest || null ||                                 The textfield to modify when a new date is selected ||
|| fade || 0.3 ||                                 Time in seconds to show/hide the popup calendar ||
|| maxDate || false ||                                 All dates that are above this one are not allowed ||
|| minDate || false ||                                 All dates that are bellow this one are not allowed ||
|| src || null ||                                 The event source, can be a textfield or a button for example ||
